title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Emotion-Based Mathematics Pedagogy Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and educational experience as a pre-service teacher
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain five major emotions (fear, envy, anger, empathy, joy) that may occur in math classes
Learners can select 10 out of 20 emotion-based teaching strategies and design specific activities for math classes
Learners can develop and present lesson plans integrating emotional design elements into real-class scenarios through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
